item.title: Inexpensive AI Agents Threaten Entry-Level Coding Jobs
item.description: AI tools cost a fraction of human labor—and may undermine the jobs needed to build careers.
item.media:keywords: artificial intelligence, Google Gemini, OpenAI, software, Labor
item.dc:creator: Paresh Dave
item.dc:subject: Price Fix

item.title: A Political Battle Is Brewing Over Data Centers
item.description: An AI-related provision in the "Big Beautiful Bill" could restrict state-level legislation of energy-hungry data centers—and is raising bipartisan objections across the US.
item.media:keywords: science, artificial intelligence, Policy, Donald Trump, Energy
item.dc:creator: Molly Taft
item.dc:subject: Artificial Intelligence
